definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: The thugs beat him senseless with a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 暴徒用棒球棒把他打得失去了知覺。

sentences.english: Today, my grandpa who is staying with us mistook me for a Japanese soldier and started to hit me with a bat.
sentences.chinese: 今天來家裏住的爺爺把我當成了日本鬼子用球棒打我。

sentences.english: The ball connected with the smaller end of the bat and grounded toward second base.
sentences.chinese: 球撞到了球棒的細端，然後向二壘滾去。

sentences.english: One popular method has been to cork the bat.
sentences.chinese: 其中一種流行的作弊手段就是在球棒裏面填充軟木。

sentences.english: A shopkeeper is in hospital after being clubbed to the ground with a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 店主被棒球棒打倒在地以後，進了醫院。

sentences.english: The bartender is a blonde girl with a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 酒保是一個帶着棒球棒的金髮女人。

sentences.english: Louisville Slugger has been manufacturing bats for some time.
sentences.chinese: 路易斯維爾製造球棒已經很久了。

sentences.english: His cane answered for a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 他的手杖可代用棒球棒。

sentences.english: The hitter swatted the ball so hard that the bat broke.
sentences.chinese: 這位擊球員擊球過重把球棒都打斷了。

sentences.english: Now swing your bat like I do.
sentences.chinese: 來，照我的樣子揮動球棒。

sentences.english: A shadow of the bat's impact zone is shown so you can line up your swing.
sentences.chinese: 球棒的擊球區會顯示出陰影，讓你可以對準了揮棒。

sentences.english: I picked up his baseball bat and swung at the man's head.
sentences.chinese: 我撿起他的棒球棒朝那個人的頭打去。

sentences.english: He maliciously damaged a car with a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 他用棒球棒惡意損毀了一輛汽車。

sentences.english: This boy has a baseball bat.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩子有一個棒球棒。

sentences.english: He flailed about madly with a baseball bat.

definition: club (golf)/cue (billiards)/also written 球桿|球杆[qiu2 gan1]
